SENT.plain: Recently, insulation breach of the Riata lead raised a big concern
Management of these externalized leads has been addressed by professional organizations
However, what to do in patients with Riata leads without manifested failure is an ongoing clinical dilemma

Here, we present two clinical scenarios where the implantable cardioverter defibrillator system failed to deliver shock therapy in spite of having a new ICD generator and "appropriately functioning leads" as revealed by lead interrogation
